7Sisters Great Dane Genome Browser
(Click on image for details):
Dog karyotype. 39 chromosomes, 2n = 78. Red represents a telomere signal. Source: Maeda J, Yurkon CR, Fujisawa H, Kaneko M, Genet SC, Roybal EJ, et al. (2012) Genomic Instability and Telomere Fusion of Canine Osteosarcoma Cells. PLoS ONE 7(8): e43355.


7Sisters Great Dane Canine Behavioral Assessment and Research Questionaire
(Click on image for details):
The C-BARQ is designed to provide dog owners and professionals with standardized evaluations of canine temperament and behavior. 7Sisters is a registered group. Contact Karen and Dustin for our group's access code.
